Source Code

  1import astroid
  2from astroid import nodes
  3from typing import List, Dict
  4
  5class HuggingFaceSmellDetector:
  6    def __init__(self):
  7        self.smells: List[Dict[str, str]] = []
  8
  9    def detect_smells(self, file_path: str) -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
 10        with open(file_path, 'r') as file:
 11            content = file.read()
 12        module = astroid.parse(content)
 13        self.visit_module(module)
 14        return self.smells
 15
 16    def visit_module(self, node: nodes.Module):
 17        self.check_model_versioning(node)
 18        self.check_tokenizer_caching(node)
 19        self.check_model_caching(node)
 20        self.check_deterministic_tokenization(node)
 21        self.check_efficient_data_loading(node)
 22        self.check_distributed_training(node)
 23        self.check_mixed_precision_training(node)
 24        self.check_gradient_accumulation(node)
 25        self.check_learning_rate_scheduling(node)
 26        self.check_early_stopping(node)
 27
 28    def add_smell(self, smell: str, fix: str, benefits: str, strategies: str):
 29        self.smells.append({
 30            "smell": smell,
 31            "how_to_fix": fix,
 32            "benefits": benefits,
 33            "strategies": strategies
 34        })
 35
 36    def check_model_versioning(self, node: nodes.Module):
 37        for call in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Call):
 38            if 'from_pretrained' in call.func.as_string():
 39                if not any('@' in arg.as_string() for arg in call.args):
 40                    self.add_smell(
 41                        "Model versioning not specified",
 42                        "Specify model version when loading pre-trained models",
 43                        "Ensures consistency and reproducibility of results",
 44                        "Use model_name_or_path@revision when loading models (e.g., bert-base-uncased@v1)"
 45                    )
 46
 47    def check_tokenizer_caching(self, node: nodes.Module):
 48        for call in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Call):
 49            if 'from_pretrained' in call.func.as_string() and 'Tokenizer' in call.func.as_string():
 50                if not any('cache_dir' in keyword.arg for keyword in call.keywords):
 51                    self.add_smell(
 52                        "Tokenizer caching not used",
 53                        "Cache tokenizers to avoid re-downloading",
 54                        "Reduces loading time and network dependency",
 55                        "Use cache_dir parameter when loading tokenizers"
 56                    )
 57
 58    def check_model_caching(self, node: nodes.Module):
 59        for call in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Call):
 60            if 'from_pretrained' in call.func.as_string() and 'Model' in call.func.as_string():
 61                if not any('cache_dir' in keyword.arg for keyword in call.keywords):
 62                    self.add_smell(
 63                        "Model caching not used",
 64                        "Cache models to avoid re-downloading",
 65                        "Improves loading efficiency and reduces network dependency",
 66                        "Use cache_dir parameter when loading models"
 67                    )
 68
 69    def check_deterministic_tokenization(self, node: nodes.Module):
 70        for call in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Call):
 71            if 'from_pretrained' in call.func.as_string() and 'Tokenizer' in call.func.as_string():
 72                if not any(keyword.arg in ['do_lower_case', 'strip_accents'] for keyword in call.keywords):
 73                    self.add_smell(
 74                        "Deterministic tokenization settings not specified",
 75                        "Use consistent tokenization settings",
 76                        "Ensures reproducible pre-processing and consistent model inputs",
 77                        "Set tokenization parameters explicitly when loading tokenizers"
 78                    )
 79
 80    def check_efficient_data_loading(self, node: nodes.Module):
 81        datasets_used = any('datasets' in import_node.names[0][0] for import_node in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.ImportFrom))
 82        if not datasets_used:
 83            self.add_smell(
 84                "Efficient data loading not detected",
 85                "Use efficient data loading techniques",
 86                "Enhances data processing speed and model training efficiency",
 87                "Use datasets library for loading and processing data"
 88            )
 89
 90    def check_distributed_training(self, node: nodes.Module):
 91        distributed_config = False
 92        for assign in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Assign):
 93            if isinstance(assign.targets[0], nodes.Name) and assign.targets[0].name == 'TrainingArguments':
 94                if any(keyword.arg in ['distributed', 'tpu'] for keyword in assign.value.keywords):
 95                    distributed_config = True
 96                    break
 97        if not distributed_config:
 98            self.add_smell(
 99                "Distributed training not configured",
100                "Utilize distributed training capabilities",
101                "Speeds up training and leverages multiple GPUs/TPUs",
102                "Configure Trainer for distributed training using distributed or TPU settings"
103            )
104
105    def check_mixed_precision_training(self, node: nodes.Module):
106        fp16_used = False
107        for assign in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Assign):
108            if isinstance(assign.targets[0], nodes.Name) and assign.targets[0].name == 'TrainingArguments':
109                if any(keyword.arg == 'fp16' and keyword.value.value for keyword in assign.value.keywords):
110                    fp16_used = True
111                    break
112        if not fp16_used:
113            self.add_smell(
114                "Mixed precision training not enabled",
115                "Use mixed precision training to improve performance",
116                "Accelerates training and reduces memory usage",
117                "Enable mixed precision training using fp16 parameter in Trainer"
118            )
119
120    def check_gradient_accumulation(self, node: nodes.Module):
121        gradient_accumulation = False
122        for assign in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Assign):
123            if isinstance(assign.targets[0], nodes.Name) and assign.targets[0].name == 'TrainingArguments':
124                if any(keyword.arg == 'gradient_accumulation_steps' and keyword.value.value > 1 for keyword in assign.value.keywords):
125                    gradient_accumulation = True
126                    break
127        if not gradient_accumulation:
128            self.add_smell(
129                "Gradient accumulation not configured",
130                "Implement gradient accumulation for large batch sizes",
131                "Allows training with larger effective batch sizes and improves convergence",
132                "Set gradient_accumulation_steps in Trainer configuration"
133            )
134
135    def check_learning_rate_scheduling(self, node: nodes.Module):
136        lr_scheduler_used = False
137        for assign in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Assign):
138            if isinstance(assign.targets[0], nodes.Name) and assign.targets[0].name == 'TrainingArguments':
139                if any(keyword.arg == 'learning_rate_scheduler' for keyword in assign.value.keywords):
140                    lr_scheduler_used = True
141                    break
142        if not lr_scheduler_used:
143            self.add_smell(
144                "Learning rate scheduler not detected",
145                "Use learning rate schedulers to dynamically adjust learning rate",
146                "Optimizes training process and enhances model performance",
147                "Configure learning_rate_scheduler in Trainer or use transformers built-in schedulers"
148            )
149
150    def check_early_stopping(self, node: nodes.Module):
151        early_stopping_used = False
152        for call in node.nodes_of_class(nodes.Call):
153            if 'EarlyStoppingCallback' in call.func.as_string():
154                early_stopping_used = True
155                break
156        if not early_stopping_used:
157            self.add_smell(
158                "Early stopping not implemented",
159                "Implement early stopping to avoid overfitting",
160                "Prevents overfitting and reduces unnecessary training time",
161                "Use EarlyStoppingCallback in Trainer configuration"
162            )
163
164    def generate_report(self) -> str:
165        report = "Hugging Face Code Smell Report\n==============================\n\n"
166        for i, smell in enumerate(self.smells, 1):
167            report += f"{i}. Smell: {smell['smell']}\n"
168            report += f"   How to Fix: {smell['how_to_fix']}\n"
169            report += f"   Benefits: {smell['benefits']}\n"
170            report += f"   Strategies: {smell['strategies']}\n\n"
171        report += f"Total smells detected: {len(self.smells)}"
172        return report
173
